data.eml:eml: First record of Pherbellia shatalkini Rozkošný (Diptera: Sciomyzidae) from Mongolia, with a redescription of the male genitalia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kurina, Olavi, Knutson, Lloyd (2019): First record of Pherbellia shatalkini Rozkošný (Diptera: Sciomyzidae) from Mongolia, with a redescription of the male genitalia. Zootaxa 4567 (3): 587-592, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4567.3.11
